format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

{{doc.name}}



"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.get_formatted('posting_date'), "dd/MM/yyyy") }}


Manager

{{doc.debiting_bank}},
{{doc.debiting_bank_branch}} Branch


CEFT TRANSFER REQUEST

Dear Sir/Madam,


I am writing with regards to formally request a CEFT Transfer as stated below,


FROM
Debiting Account Name: {{doc.debit_account_name}}
Debiting Account Number: -{{doc.debiting_account_number}}-
Bank: {{doc.debiting_bank}} {{doc.debiting_bank_branch}}
Amount: {{ doc.get_formatted('amount') }}/-


TO
Crediting Account Name: {{doc.crediting_account_name}}
Crediting Account Number: -{{doc.crediting_account_number}}-
Bank: {{doc.crediting_bank}} {{doc.crediting_bank_branch}}
Amount: {{ doc.get_formatted('amount') }}/-


Sincerely,

"}]
name: CEFT Letter
